feed.title: Trafikito.com Support
feed.subtitle: Trafikito.com initially monitors for free RAM, disk space, CPU and sends email when something wrong but it also can monitor output of any command and execute any API call when something happens.

entry.title: I forgot my password, how can I get a new one?

link.title: I forgot my password, how can I get a new one?

entry.content:
This is a 3 steps process which you can start here: Recover

  1. Enter your email which you used to register and click Request new password.
  2. You will get an email with a password recovery link. Click on it.
  3. You will get another email with a new password. Use it to login.

After completing the 2nd step, your old password will stop working and you will need to use the new random password that was sent during step 3.
entry.summary: This is a 3 steps process which you can start here: Recover

entry.title: How to register?
entry.content:
Registration is free and quick. You will only need your Goolge account or email address and complete the registration form to do it.

  • Name - your name.
  • Country
    • If the type is person - select the country where the person comes from
    • If the type is company - select where the company is registered.
  • Email - the email used to login. This is also the default email where the email notifications will be sent. You can change the notification email at any time.
  • Password - password for the account
entry.summary: Registration is free and quick. You will only need your Goolge account or email address and complete the registration form to do it.

entry.title: How to delete all my data and account?

link.title: How to delete all my data and account?

entry.content:
You can delete all your data at any time. Login to Trafikito and on your account page you will find the option to delete your account. To delete your account you must leave all workspaces first. Follow these steps to delete it:

  1. Open the main menu on the top left [menu icon]
  2. Select your name
  3. Make sure Account tab is active
  4. Scroll down to view Delete account option
  5. Expand Delete account and click the Delete Account button
  6. Confirm deletion

Some logs may still be on our database or cached on our edges but eventually it will be deleted after the expiration dates. For example the free plan saves logs for 24 hours, paid plans for longer. API call logs are saved for 7 days. Such logs will be deleted after it expires and will not be visible to any user when the server is deleted.
entry.summary: You can delete all your data at any time. Login to Trafikito and on your account page you will find the option to delete your account. To delete your account you must leave all workspaces first. Follow these steps to delete it:

entry.title: How to change my password?
entry.content:
To change your password, you must login to Trafikito client and navigate here: Change password

Just enter the current password, then the new password and click the Save new password button. If you lost your password and want to recover, use this link: Recover
entry.summary: To change your password, you must login to Trafikito client and navigate here: Change password

entry.title: Do I need a credit card to register?

link.title: Do I need a credit card to register?

entry.content: No. Registration is free and Trafikito provides a great free plan without a trial period. If you decide to upgrade to a paid plan, you will need to select an available payment option while paying for the plan.
entry.summary: No. Registration is free and Trafikito provides a great free plan without a trial period. If you decide to upgrade to a paid plan, you will need to select an available payment option while paying for the plan.

entry.title: Can I change my email?
entry.content:
Yes. Login to Trafikito and navigate to this URL: Account

There is a form and one of the fields is Email. Update it to new email address, double check to ensure that it is correct then click Update account.

If you entered an email which is already in use, there will be a message about it.
entry.summary: Yes. Login to Trafikito and navigate to this URL: Account

entry.title: Why does it say “Must be owner or admin”?

link.title: Why does it say “Must be owner or admin”?

entry.content: In particular sections, Trafikito shows a warning message that a member must be the owner or admin. It means that your role is insufficient for that specific view and you need to have a higher role. You can ask admins or owner to make changes.
entry.summary: In particular sections, Trafikito shows a warning message that a member must be the owner or admin. It means that your role is insufficient for that specific view and you need to have a higher role. You can ask admins or owner to make changes.

entry.title: Why create a workspace?
entry.content: When you want to separate servers and members from another workspace. E.g. your hobby projects may be in your personal workspace while the company you work with may use branded workspaces with the company name.
entry.summary: When you want to separate servers and members from another workspace. E.g. your hobby projects may be in your personal workspace while the company you work with may use branded workspaces with the company name.

entry.title: Who owns the workspace?
entry.content:
When you register for the first time, an initial workspace is created for you and you are the owner of it. You can always see who is the owner of an active workspace.

  1. Open the main menu on the top left [menu icon]
  2. Select Dashboard
  3. On top of the servers list, you can see the name of the selected workspace. Click it to open more details
  4. On the top select Members tab
  5. Find the member with the role “owner” next to it. This member is an owner of the selected workspace.

There can only be one owner at a time. Only the owner can select another member to become the new owner.
entry.summary: When you register for the first time, an initial workspace is created for you and you are the owner of it. You can always see who is the owner of an active workspace.

entry.title: Who can see workspace invoices?
entry.content: All active members of the workspace.
entry.summary: All active members of the workspace.
